alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 7:36AM EST until January 14 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...EXTREMELY SLICK TRAVEL THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inchup to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Maine. Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Freezing rain will continue this morning, making for an icy glaze on bare pavement. Expect very treacherous conditions. Do not travel unless absolutely necessary. Any light snowfall on top of the ice will make the slick travel even worse.
info.instruction: The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511. org Be prepared for treacherous roads. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
